channel.title: Nowicki Lab
channel.description: In the Nowicki Lab, we utilize the molecular genetics approach to uncover important processes that drive species diversity, evolutionary history, and explain important traits in plants and their pathogens

item.title: New papers about Eastern Redbud, Cercis canadensis L.
item.description: Meher Ony MS publishes her thesis research on redbud diversity.

item.title: Shiwani Sapkota's MS proposal seminar
item.description: Shiwani Sapkota delivered her MS proposal seminar at the EPP Department.

item.title: Redbud haplotyping - Trinity Hamm proposal seminar
item.description: Trinity, MS student in the Trigiano lab (I'm her MS committee member), had her Dpt Proposal Seminar.

item.title: 30th USDA Interagency Research Forum on Invasive Species
item.description: With my student Shiwnai Sapkota, we attended the exciting Forum on Invasive Species in Annapolis, MD.

item.title: The effect of habitat fragmentation on genetic diversity and differentiation; fine-scale population structure of Cercis canadensis (Eastern Redbud)
item.description: Fine-scale genetic diversity study of Eastern redbud indicates two distinct genetic clusters in the Southern Appalachia.

item.title: Evaluation of genetic diversity of Asian callery pear
item.description: In this endeavor, Shiwani (MS student) is evaluating species diversity using de novo gSSRs. We accrued samples of non-cultivated P. calleryana from Asia. Molecular markers will be tested for cross-amplification to related species as well.

item.title: Road trips for redbuds; An assessment of the genetic diversity and spatial distribution of Cercis canadensis in the US
item.description: Genetic diversity study of Eastern redbud indicates two distinct genetic clusters across the species native range in the US.

item.title: Eastern Redbud chlorotyping and diversity assessment
item.description: Chloroplast DNA haplotying of redbuds is expected to provide lineage and spread data, inaccessible with nuclear DNA SSRs.

item.title: Shiwani Sapkota
item.description: Short introduction about my 1st MS student.

item.title: Diversity of Eastern Redbud, Cercis canadensis, native to US
item.description: MS thesis project of Meher A. Ony. Includes two major objectives, (1) gSSR selection and redbud fine-scale study, and (2) genetic diversity assessment across the species native range.
